title: Exceed 100% Audio in Arch
text:
Sometimes in Arch the audio is too low, to exceed the max value and go for example to 150%, we can use this command:
pactl set-sink-volume @DEFAULT_SINK@ 150%

title: Waybar restart
text:
When you change the waybar config file you have to restart waybar to see the changes. 

The solution
The command to restart waybar is
killall -SIGUSR2 waybar

title: Sioyek Rebuild
text:
In yay or paru, after you upgrade a package, it is up to you to rebuild it when needed. This is the case for sioyek.


The solution
The command to rebuil sioyek is
yay --rebuild sioyek
